document.forum_title: Latest World News on One News Page
document.discussion_title: Embracing Cloud can help India master digital era: Oracle ( Interview)
document.topic_text: Embracing Cloud can help India master digital era: Oracle ( Interview) Monday, 22 August 2016 ( 19 minutes ago ) New Delhi, Aug 22 : India is poised to become the world's leading market for Cloud, and for US software major Oracle, Cloud is a force-multiplier that the country must embrace to leapfrog into the digital era, a top company executive has said.
document.post: Embracing Cloud can help India master digital era: Oracle ( Interview) Monday, 22 August 2016 ( 19 minutes ago ) New Delhi, Aug 22 : India is poised to become the world's leading market for Cloud, and for US software major Oracle, Cloud is a force-multiplier that the country must embrace to leapfrog into the digital era, a top company executive has said.
